Package camzup.core

Class Knot3

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.Knot3
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Knot3>
public class Knot3 extends Object implements Comparable<Knot3>
Organizes the vectors that shape a cubic Bezier curve into a coordinate (or anchor point), fore handle (the following control point) and rear handle (the preceding control point).

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    Knot3.AbstrEasing
    An abstract class to facilitate the creation of knot easing functions.
    static class 
    Knot3.Lerp
    A functional class to ease between two knots with linear interpolation.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    final Vec3
    coord
    The spatial coordinate of the knot.
    final Vec3
    foreHandle
    The handle that warps the curve segment heading away from the knot along the direction of the curve.
    final Vec3
    rearHandle
    The handle that warps the curve segment heading towards the knot along the direction of the curve.

    hashCode()
    Returns the knot's hash code based on those of its three constituent vectors.
    Knot3
    mirrorHandles()
    Mirrors this knot's handles.
    Knot3
    mirrorHandlesBackward()
    Sets the forward-facing handle to mirror the rear-facing handle: the fore will have the same magnitude and negated direction of the rear.
    Knot3
    mirrorHandlesForward()
    Sets the rear-facing handle to mirror the forward-facing handle: the rear will have the same magnitude and negated direction of the fore.
    static Vec3
    rearDir(Knot3 knot, Vec3 target)
    Gets the rear handle of a knot as a direction, rather than as a point.

    rearMag(Knot3 knot)
    Returns the magnitude of the knot's rear handle, i.e., the Euclidean distance between the rear handle and the coordinate.

    • Knot3

      public Knot3(float xCoord, float yCoord, float zCoord, float xFore, float yFore, float zFore)
      Creates a knot from a coordinate and fore handle. The rear handle is a mirror of the fore handle.
      Parameters:
      xCoord - the x coordinate
      yCoord - the y coordinate
      zCoord - the z coordinate
      xFore - the fore handle x
      yFore - the fore handle y
      zFore - the fore handle z

      yFore - the fore handle y
      zFore - the fore handle z

      yRear - the rear handle y
      zRear - the rear handle z

      public Knot3 mirrorHandlesBackward()

      this knot

    • mirrorHandlesForward

      public Knot3 mirrorHandlesForward()
      Sets the rear-facing handle to mirror the forward-facing handle: the rear will have the same magnitude and negated direction of the fore.
      Returns:
      this knot

    • rotate

      public Knot3 rotate(float cosa, float sina, Vec3 axis)
      Rotates this knot around an axis by an angle in radians. The axis is assumed to be of unit length. Accepts pre-calculated sine and cosine of an angle, so that collections of knots can be efficiently rotated without repeatedly calling cos and sin.
      Parameters:
      cosa - cosine of the angle
      sina - sine of the angle
      axis - the axis of rotation
      Returns:
      this knot
      See Also:
      • Vec3.rotate(Vec3, float, float, Vec3, Vec3)

      Sets the coordinate, fore- and rear-handles to the input coordinate.
      Parameters:
      coord - the coordinate
      Returns:
      this knot

    • set

      public Knot3 set(Vec3 coord, Vec3 foreHandle)
      Sets the knot's coordinate and fore handle. The rear handle is a mirror of the fore handle.
      Parameters:
      coord - the coordinate
      foreHandle - the fore handle
      Returns:
      this knot

    • set

      public Knot3 set(Vec3 coord, Vec3 foreHandle, Vec3 rearHandle)
      Sets this knot from a series of vectors.
      Parameters:
      coord - the coordinate
      foreHandle - the fore handle
      rearHandle - the rear handle
      Returns:
      this knot

    • fromSegCatmull

      public static Knot3 fromSegCatmull(float xPrevAnchor, float yPrevAnchor, float zPrevAnchor, float xCurrAnchor, float yCurrAnchor, float zCurrAnchor, float xNextAnchor, float yNextAnchor, float zNextAnchor, float xAdvAnchor, float yAdvAnchor, float zAdvAnchor, float tightness, Knot3 prev, Knot3 next)
      Sets two knots from a segment of a Catmull-Rom curve. The default curve tightness is 0.0.

      Assumes that the previous knot's coordinate is set to a prior anchor point. The previous knot's fore handle, the next knot's rear handle and the next knot's coordinate are set by this function.
      Parameters:
      xPrevAnchor - the previous anchor x
      yPrevAnchor - the previous anchor y
      zPrevAnchor - the previous anchor z
      xCurrAnchor - the current anchor x
      yCurrAnchor - the current anchor y
      zCurrAnchor - the current anchor z
      xNextAnchor - the next anchor x
      yNextAnchor - the next anchor y
      zNextAnchor - the next anchor z
      xAdvAnchor - the advance anchor x
      yAdvAnchor - the advance anchor y
      zAdvAnchor - the advance anchor z
      tightness - the curve tightness
      prev - the previous knot
      next - the next knot
      Returns:
      the next knot

    • fromSegCatmull

      public static Knot3 fromSegCatmull(Vec3 prevAnchor, Vec3 currAnchor, Vec3 nextAnchor, Vec3 advAnchor, float tightness, Knot3 prev, Knot3 next)
      Sets two knots from a segment of a Catmull-Rom curve. The default curve tightness is 0.0.

      Assumes that the previous knot's coordinate is set to a prior anchor point. The previous knot's fore handle, the next knot's rear handle and the next knot's coordinate are set by this function.
      Parameters:
      prevAnchor - the previous anchor
      currAnchor - the current anchor
      nextAnchor - the next anchor
      advAnchor - the advance anchor
      tightness - the curve tightness
      prev - the previous knot
      next - the next knot
      Returns:
      the next knot

    • fromSegLinear

      public static Knot3 fromSegLinear(float xNextAnchor, float yNextAnchor, float zNextAnchor, Knot3 prev, Knot3 next)
      Sets a knot from a line segment. Assumes that the previous knot's coordinate is set to the first anchor point.

      The previous knot's fore handle, the next knot's rear handle and the next knot's coordinate are set by this function.
      Parameters:
      xNextAnchor - the next anchor x
      yNextAnchor - the next anchor y
      zNextAnchor - the next anchor z
      prev - the previous knot
      next - the next knot
      Returns:
      the next knot

    • fromSegQuadratic

      public static Knot3 fromSegQuadratic(float xControl, float yControl, float zControl, float xNextAnchor, float yNextAnchor, float zNextAnchor, Knot3 prev, Knot3 next)
      Sets two knots from a segment of a quadratic curve. Assumes that the previous knot's coordinate is set to the first anchor point.

      The previous knot's fore handle, the next knot's rear handle and the next knot's coordinate are set by this function.
      Parameters:
      xControl - the control point x
      yControl - the control point y
      zControl - the control point z
      xNextAnchor - the next anchor x
      yNextAnchor - the next anchor y
      zNextAnchor - the next anchor z
      prev - the previous knot
      next - the next knot
      Returns:
      next knot

    • smoothHandles

      public static Knot3 smoothHandles(Knot3 prev, Knot3 curr, Knot3 next, Vec3 carry)
      Smoothes the handles of a knot with reference to a previous and next knot. A helper function to Curve3.smoothHandles(Curve3) .
      Parameters:
      prev - the previous knot
      curr - the current knot
      next - the next knot
      carry - a temporary vector
      Returns:
      the current knot

    • smoothHandlesFirst

      public static Knot3 smoothHandlesFirst(Knot3 curr, Knot3 next, Vec3 carry)
      Smoothes the fore handle of the first knot in an open curve. A helper function to Curve3.smoothHandles(Curve3) .
      Parameters:
      curr - the current knot
      next - the next knot
      carry - a temporary vector
      Returns:
      the current knot

    • smoothHandlesLast

      public static Knot3 smoothHandlesLast(Knot3 prev, Knot3 curr, Vec3 carry)
      Smoothes the rear handle of the last knot in an open curve. A helper function to Curve3.smoothHandles(Curve3) .
      Parameters:
      prev - the previous knot
      curr - the current knot
      carry - a temporary vector
      Returns:
      the current knot
